name: Classic Theme Config Pages
description: Changes appearance of some elements in Firefox Config Pages to look more classically. Pages affected: about:config, Permissions Manager, Session Restore, Stylish Editor, Customization Mode, Findbar and Sidepanel. Elements affected: buttons, tree elements, lists, textfields and menulists.
additional_info: Every feedback is appreciated, tell me if you like it ;p. Post me also if something will work wrong.
